price: Kandi rwose (imvura) twarayibasaranganyije kugira ngo batekereze (inema za Allah), ariko abenshi mu bantu baranze bahitamo guhakana.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnāhu baynahum liyadhakkarū fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
